name: Joker
description: Tumbling entry. 1 rotation only, stopped during the dive. Exit with high energy connected to a Helicopter to the same side + SAT to Helicopter connection

criterias.normal: energy on entry, timing, flow, energy on exit, angle, connection to Helicopter (fluidity, rapidity). Only 1 Tumbling rotation
criterias.twisted: twisted on the entry, twisted on the dive, must untwist during the connection into helicopter
criterias.reverse: immediate transition to a Helicopter in the opposite direction.
criterias.devil twist: Twisted during the entry, untwisted during the beginning of the connection, re twisted by the connection to heli. Must stay twisted for minimum 2 turns of heli. Can untwist for the exit
